I think you might enjoy "This Is Spinal Tap"! It's a classic comedy that follows the antics of a fictional British rock band on their disastrous US tour. With an all-star cast, including Rob Reiner and Michael McKean, this movie is sure to have you laughing out loud.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more serious, "We the Living" might be up your alley. It's a thought-provoking drama that explores what happens when individuality clashes with the demands of a oppressive regime. With its powerful themes and stunning visuals, this film is sure to leave you thinking long after the credits roll.

The all-star cast, including David Wayne and Paula Kelly, brings this gripping story to life. Would you give it a try?
